content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-18.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), and (-13.5, -49.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -49.5) and (-9.5, -49.5)

### Coal Storage and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting but being too far
- Ensure you are close to the target entity from which you want to extract items before attempting extraction.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting placement to avoid conflicts with existing entities.

### Errors when transferring items to non-existent entities
- Verify the existence of the target entity (e.g., iron-chest) at the specified position before attempting to transfer items to it.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory items
- Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to supply or transfer them to other entities.

### Inserter waiting for source items
- Check the supply chain to ensure that the inserter has access to the required source items to continue its operation.
